item.title: PR Department
item.description: The primary collective roles of the PR department included the creation of a press pack and press release and liaison with the public, media and critical friends. PR meetings were held weekly during the 12-week production timeline and more regularly in the lead up to the publication of our press release, press pack and festival launch event. Press Release and Press Pack The creation of a press release required the identification of Rebound Arts Festivalâ€™s unique selling point.
